channel.title: "317serv" source doesn't have a compile or run
channel.description: How am I supposed to start a server without a compile or run? And if you can recommend me to any good sourcesthat would be great.

item.title: "317serv" source doesn't have a compile or run
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

The code to run a server is this.

@echo off color 0a title (Your servername) Runner java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: "317serv" source doesn't have a compile or run

item.title: "317serv" source doesn't have a compile or run
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

…i will give you the compiler, but you need to make the run file on your own

step 1: make a new text document
step 2: paste this into it:
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” *.java
echo finished!
pause

NOTE: for step 2 figure out your java version (current version is 6.0_21) if you dont have 18 replace the 18 with the version you have

step 3: click on saveas under the file tab and save it as compile.bat

step 4: test it by double clicking on it

simple compilers work the best

@scape-JAVA
dont troll me

Read full topic

item.title: "317serv" source doesn't have a compile or run
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

attk mast3r:

if you cant make one then you have no business making an RSPS you will fail miserably if you cant do this simple task

Speak for your self bud.
@ontopic; try any random server that looks fun to you, it’s totally up to you which server you decide to use.

@super_c wrote:

Not very helpful. I can’t just pull stuff out of my ass, I need somewhere to start
